WSUS31 KKCI 201655 
SIGE  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 44E 
VALID UNTIL 1855Z 
NC SC GA CSTL WTRS 
FROM 110SE ILM-200SSE ILM-100ENE CRG-100ESE CHS-110SE ILM 
AREA TS MOV FROM 24045KT. TOPS ABV FL450. 
REF INTL SIGMET DELTA SERIES.

FROM 160NE TRV-220ENE TRV-60ENE PBI-40ESE RSW-90WSW SRQ-160NE TRV 
REF WW 127. 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.

WSUS31 KKCI 201655 
SIGE  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 43E 
VALID UNTIL 1855Z 
FL AND CSTL WTRS 
FROM 110ENE OMN-160NE TRV-70SW SRQ-120WSW PIE-110ENE OMN 
AREA SEV TS MOV FROM 27035KT. TOPS ABV FL450. 
TORNADOES...WIND GUSTS TO 50KT POSS. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 201855-202255 
FROM 160NE TRV-220ENE TRV-60ENE PBI-40ESE RSW-90WSW SRQ-160NE TRV 
REF WW 127. 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
==
